name: Sailor Moon SuperS: Believe in Pegasus: The Four Guardians' Super Transformation
short_description: News reports of Pegasus attacking the town cause Usagi and the other Sailor Guardians to have doubts about whether Pegasus can be trusted or not, much to Chibi-Usa's frustration. But the girls soon learn that it was a trap laid by Fish's Eye to lure the real Pegasus out into the open.

package_groups.name: default
